ISSUE.TITLE: Liquid don't resolves Model.Classes in widgets
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Describe the bug Trying to update an existing site to latest dev, `Model.Classes` expression is evaluated to `NilValue` in widgets, wheras it's a widely used pattern in templates : ```liquid <article class="{{ Model.Classes | join: " " }}"> ... </article> ``` It seems to be a property white-listing issue since `Model` and `Model.ContentItem` are correctly evaluated.
